overview:
Andrew Macgregor is the network marketing specialist of the Exploroo team. His knowledge and experience in IT and network marketing make him a very valuable asset. He knows precisely how to take a group of relatively unrelated people and turn them into a group of profitable prospects.

Andrew was born in Sydney, Australia, but is now a resident of Thailand. He is fluent in Thai, and his public speaking skills make it easy for him to communicate his ideas with others.

Over the last 12 years, Andrew has worked with some of the top network marketing companies in Australia and Thailand. His ability to sell has made him a valuable asset to every organization he has been a part of, and nothing less is expected of him by Exploroo.

Andrew fills the CIO position at Exploroo. He is sure to provide valuable input and knowledge to his colleagues at Exploroo and help develop this business!
